Container.Name: SponsorsHelper
Container.Overview:
SponsorsHelper is a Docker image that solves CAPTCHAs and decrypts links for Quasarr.
Runtime access requires an active monthly GitHub sponsorship. On first start, open the GitHub authorization URL from container logs and complete the auth flow.
Mount /config to persistent storage. The cached auth token is stored at /config/github_oauth_token.json and will be lost if /config is not persistent.
Container.Requires: Active monthly GitHub sponsorship for runtime authentication

Config.Name: Config folder
Config.Description: Persistent SponsorsHelper state including cached GitHub auth token.

Config.Name: Quasarr URL
Config.Description: Local URL of Quasarr including protocol and port (for example http://192.168.0.1:8080).

Config.Name: Quasarr API Key
Config.Description: Required API key from Quasarr web UI under Show API Settings.

Config.Name: FlareSolverr URL
Config.Description: Local URL of FlareSolverr endpoint (for example http://10.10.0.1:8191/v1).
